name: Bomb!
description:
Protect your people by avoiding the bombs.

Simply pick the people with your mouse and move them away from the bombs!

  • Made in Godot for the ScoreSpace Jam #17, in roughly 6hours (part of it live on Twitch)
  • Font: American Captain https://www.dafont.com/american-captain.font
  • CRT shader: https://godotshaders.com/shader/vhs-and-crt-monitor-effect/
  • Godot SFXr addon: https://github.com/tomeyro/godot-sfxr
  • Twitch: https://twitch.tv/mreliptik
  • YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/MrEliptik
  • Twitter: https://twitter.com/mreliptik_
  • Instagram:  https://www.instagram.com/_mreliptik
  • All links: https://mreliptik.carrd.co/
